english.segment2: Great is Your love. Let the whole earth sing. Let the whole earth sing. You reached for us. From on heaven's throne. When we had no hope
english.segment4: You are the way. There is no other. You are the way. There is no other
english.segment6: You rose from death to victory. You reign in life. Oh majesty. Your name be high and lifted up. Jesus, Jesus alive in us
english.segment8: You outshine the sun. You are glorious. You are glorious. Lord over all. You have made us new. We owe it all to You
english.segment10: In everything. Be exalted. In everything. Be exalted
english.segment12: You rose from death to victory. You reign in life. Oh majesty. Your name be high and lifted up. Jesus, Jesus alive in us
english.segment14: The enemy is under Your feet. We are free. We are free. Death has been defeated by love. You overcome. You overcome. The enemy is under Your feet. We are free. We are free. Death has been defeated by love. You overcome. You overcome
english.segment16: You rose from death to victory. You reign in life. Oh majesty. Your name be high and lifted up. Jesus, Jesus alive in us. Jesus, Jesus alive in us
